channel.title: HuggingFace on Miguel Aspis's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in HuggingFace on Miguel Aspis's Portfolio

item.title: Various NLP tasks done with state-of-the-art models
item.description: Table of Contents Table of Contents Introduction Sentiment Analysis with DistillBert English-Portuguese Translation with transformer Text summarization - BART Introduction This project was done mainly to learn the basics of streamlit, huggingface’s inference api and heroku app deployment and as such it isn’t very technically complex. Since the actual implementation is so basic due to the use of the pre-trained and fine-tuned models available at huggingface hub I have decided to write more in depth about the models used for each task.
